EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-Email-SBC for E Nurture-T001ZO.Email 7 Consideration
EmailTemplate.subject: Migrating enterprise SBCs to the cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> The challenge of moving SBCs to the cloud Enterprises in many industries have started moving legacy networks to a software-centric network, which leads to significant reduction in operational expenses and enables the enterprise to meet the needs of their business with agility.
But how can you do this for a Session Border Controller, which strongly depends on high performance compute power for real-time media conversions like transcoding and encryption?
Get the answers in our white paper: Migrating enterprise session border controllers to the cloud.
In this paper, you’ll get valuable insights into how to ensure optimal performance virtualizing the media plane for a cloud-based SBC. Enjoy! {{my.Email Signature Person}} {{my.Email Signature Title}}, Nokia © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> · Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> · Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
